title: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value that is set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value that is set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow the steps below:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'.
4. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
6. Modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
7. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
